name: ITLibPlaylist
desc: This class describes a playlist in the iTunes library.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: The name or title of the playlist.

items.name: var items: [ITLibMediaItem]
items.desc: The media items (tracks) in the playlist.

items.name: var parentID: NSNumber?
items.desc: The unique persistent identifier of the playlist’s parent playlist.

items.name: var isPrimary: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the playlist is the primary playlist.

items.name: var isVisible: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the playlist is visible to the user in iTunes.

items.name: var distinguishedKind: ITLibDistinguishedPlaylistKind
items.desc: An indication of whether the playlist has a special distinction.

items.name: var kind: ITLibPlaylistKind
items.desc: An indication of the type of playlist.

items.name: enum ITLibPlaylistKind
items.desc: These constants specify the possible kinds of playlists.

items.name: enum ITLibDistinguishedPlaylistKind
items.desc: These constants specify the possible kinds of distinguished playlists.

items.name: let ITLibPlaylistPropertyAllItemsPlaylist: String
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the API exposes every item in the playlist.

items.name: let ITLibPlaylistPropertyDistinguisedKind: String
items.desc: An indication of whether the playlist has a special distinction.

items.name: let ITLibPlaylistPropertyItems: String
items.desc: The media items (tracks) in the playlist.

items.name: let ITLibPlaylistPropertyKind: String
items.desc: An indication of the type of playlist.

items.name: let ITLibPlaylistPropertyPrimary: String
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the playlist is the primary playlist.

items.name: let ITLibPlaylistPropertyName: String
items.desc: The name or title of the playlist.

items.name: let ITLibPlaylistPropertyParentPersistentID: String
items.desc: The unique persistent identifier of the playlist’s parent playlist.

items.name: let ITLibPlaylistPropertyVisible: String
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the playlist is visible to the user in iTunes.
